text: Lekin sumoro in manfiat naʙaxsid, ʙalki ʙa'd az didani cunin mu'cizaho dilhoi sumo cun sang saxt gardid, hatto saxttar az sang gardid, zero ki az ʙa'ze sangho goho cujho ravon mesavand va cun ʙa'zei digar sikofta savad, oʙ az on ʙerun ojad va goh sang az tarsi Alloh az ʙolo ʙa niseʙ furu aftad va Alloh az on cize, ki mekuned, ƣofil nest
